title: Audit toolset-related xplat changes
body: Especially in and around ToolsetReader.cs, there have been a lot of changes in toolset handling in xplat. That makes sense, since toolsets are much less of a concept in .NET Core land. But some of the changes are unclear and possibly stale.

nodes.body: Marking this as complete: we shipped VS2017 RC from the xplat branch and haven't yet seen any break-the-world changes. We believe the way forward is to fix any problems that we discover in xplat, rather than revert to the two-branch world.
